languages.text: "Мерзкие мутанты не стали бы поминать святую. Это дело рук того, кто разбирается в Кредо".
"Vile mutants do not make allusions to saints. This was someone versed in the Creed."
languages.original_text: "Мерзкие мутанты не стали бы поминать святую. Это дело рук того, кто разбирается в Кредо".

traits.locale_text: "Vile mutants wouldn't have alluded to a saint. It was someone educated about the Creed."
"Vile mutants wouldn't have alluded to a saint. It was someone educated about the Creed."
"Vile mutants do not make allusions to saints. This was someone versed in the Creed."
"Vile mutants do not make allusions to saints. This was someone versed in the Creed."
"Vile mutants do not make allusions to saints. This was someone versed in the Creed."
"Vile mutants do not make allusions to saints. This was someone versed in the Creed."

languages.text: « Les mutants impies n'ont pas pour habitude de faire référence aux saints. Autrement dit, nous avons affaire à un individu qui connaît bien le Crédo. »
languages.original_text: "Vile mutants do not make allusions to saints. This was someone versed in the Creed."

traits.locale_text: « Les mutants impies n'ont pas pour habitude de faire référence aux saints. Autrement dit, nous avons affaire à un individu qui connaît bien le Crédo. »

languages.text: «Los mutantes inmundos no hacen referencias a santos. Esto es obra de alguien que conoce bien el Credo».
languages.original_text: "Vile mutants do not make allusions to saints. This was someone versed in the Creed."

traits.locale_text: «Los mutantes inmundos no hacen referencias a santos. Esto es obra de alguien que conoce bien el Credo».

languages.text: “邪恶的变种人根本不会崇拜圣人，凶手一定对帝国信仰了如指掌。”
languages.original_text: "Vile mutants do not make allusions to saints. This was someone versed in the Creed."

traits.locale_text: “邪恶的变种人根本不会崇拜圣人，凶手一定对帝国信仰了如指掌。”

languages.text: 「下劣な変異体は聖人についてほのめかしたりはしません。これは信条に精通した人物です」
languages.original_text: "Vile mutants do not make allusions to saints. This was someone versed in the Creed."

traits.locale_text: 「下劣な変異体は聖人についてほのめかしたりはしません。これは信条に精通した人物です」

languages.text: "Widerwärtige Mutanten spielen nicht auf Heilige an. Das war jemand, der mit dem Glauben bestens vertraut ist."
languages.original_text: "Vile mutants do not make allusions to saints. This was someone versed in the Creed."

traits.locale_text: "Widerwärtige Mutanten spielen nicht auf Heilige an. Das war jemand, der mit dem Glauben bestens vertraut ist."

languages.text: "Habis mutantlar, azizlere dair kinayeler yapmazlar. Bu, İtikat'a aşina birisinin işi."
languages.original_text: "Vile mutants do not make allusions to saints. This was someone versed in the Creed."
